names.english: clear fire and scour phlegm decoction
names.commonEnglish: Clear Fire and Scour Phlegm Decoction

actions: Activates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, clears Heat, soothes irritability, nourishes the Blood and calms the Spirit.
With Bai Zi Ren, for Heart Blood Deficiency causing palpitations and insomnia.
Quiets the Heart, calms the Spirit and soothes the nerves.
Calms Liver Yang, extinguishes Wind, promotes the movement of Heart Qi and Blood and stimulates Blood circulation.
Regulates Qi, adjusts the Middle, relieves the diaphragm, dries Dampness and transforms Phlegm.
Nourishes Stomach Yin, generates Fluids, clears the Heart and eliminates irritability.
Nourishes the Heart and calms the Spirit.
Clears Heat, dissolves Phlegm, calms Wind and stops convulsions.
Clears Heat, transforms Phlegm and penetrates to the channels.
With Sheng Di Huang, for symptoms associated with Turbid Phlegm Obstructing the Heart Orifices.
Transforms Phlegm, softens hardness, eliminates toxins and dissipates nodules.
Warms the Middle, stops vomiting and normalizes the flow of Qi at the center.
With Zhu Li, for coughing and headaches due to Heat induced Phlegm or aphasia and numbness from Wind-Stroke due to Phlegm Obstruction.
With Chen Pi, for Cold-Dampness Obstructing the Middle with nausea and hiccups.

manifestations.tongue: Pink or Red tip or Red
manifestations.pulse: Slippery and rapid or Wiry and rapid or Rolling and rapid
